item.title: Figuring Out Hugo
item.description:
Learning Hugo was confusing at first, especially understanding the difference between _index.md and regular markdown files. After breaking the site a few times, I finally got the structure down.

This post is a reflection on what helped me understand the framework better.

item.title: What I Learned in This Class
item.description:
This class taught me how to use Git and GitHub correctly, how static sites work, and how to debug mistakes without panicking.

This post sums up the main things I’m taking away from the course.
